name: Bennie Miller
text: They have completely turned around this Pizza Hut. It used to be trash and since the new manager (Joe Reed I believe) took over, the quality and speed has changed dramatically. Great improvements and wonderful pizza.

name: Chinele Sutton
text: I hate to even give it a star. Everything was burnt.. We asked for marina and they said they are all out. I'm sorry but how can you be all out. Next time I'll just drive to Lewiston. :/

name: rugerkampf
text: I ordered a pizza half hour before closing.....they delivered far before the half hour requirement!!!!! Delicious pizza!!!!!! GO CLARKSTON PIZZA HUT

name: Chris Cable
text: Tried to order the online special today, but they refused to honor it.  The chain continues to have problems.

name: Jan Ahles
text: Dust bunnies and hair on my wing basket, bread sticks delivered after our meal and cold covered in marinara sauce.  Sorry excuse for a pizza joint

name: Matt Wolf
text: Ya know it wasn't bad until I got to the front desk and saw the bill I mean holy guacamole u would think I'm buying a rare Pokemon I mean it's like buying a TI 84 plus calculator gee wiz

name: Local Top 20
text: Lots of TVs and friendly staff.
